phrases: Class 3-2
I have to hide somewhere!
I have to wake up...
I have to wake up soon!
Or they will...
Ryo?
Wh-What do I do?
It found me...
Next time, I am finished!
October 8th Nocturnal Community Relations Division
Storage 1
What the heck, where did it go?
Where could it have gone?
Miyako, are you almost done?
Yes, just give me a minute.
So, what are you doing, Theo?
Do you guys know what happened to that budget request I made?
The one you met with the other sections about,
and even got the bureau director's stamp on?
Yeah!
The one that took me a whole week.
Did you lose it during our last paperwork cleanup?
No!
I have to go through that whole stamp rally again?!
I will help you look, Theo-san!
Thank you!
You are such a great co-worker!
Hold it.
We have an urgent job.
Look.
Urgent?
From Koharu-san?
Subject: Sakaki-kun, Urgent Request To: Sakaki Kyoichi From: Senda Reiji Aida Koharu-san from General Affairs has a kid who is involved in some kind of Another-related trouble.
Please talk to her.
It seems like her kid is having nightmares and cannot sleep at night.
Koharu-san?
Yeah.
She works here in our building.
Her kid's having nightmares?
Aida-san is working late tonight and will be at Cafe Lambre at 19:00.
I cannot go because I have got a social function, so somebody go get the details and fill me in later.
Would not you usually go to a hospital for that?
Senda-san sent it to us because he assumed that would be the wrong move.
So this is our priority for the day
No!
That budget sheet is a priority!
You understand, right?
Miyako, want to go alone?
Is it okay?
I will leave it to you.
Just do not do anything on your own.
I will give Aida-san a call, so you can go talk to her.
Roger that.
I am on it.
I will do my best.
We saw something like this before, right?
Yeah.
It was worse in Nerima and Ota Wards than here, though.
Oh, that is why...
If it is happened before, it is easier to deal with.
And it is about time for him to start gaining some confidence in his work, right?
If you are capable of being that considerate,
why did you boss him around like that during the Azazel thing?
I already said I feel bad about that.
I underestimated him.
I did not think he would refuse my apology.
I feel like I am in debt.
If you really feel that way...
Ow!
Then be a good senpai and pay him back.
Sure thing.
So, how much have you heard?
It has to do with dreams, and involves our department.
That is all I know.
I see.
I have two boys, you see.
The younger one's name is Ryo.
His school called and told me he keeps napping in class.
I told you not to stay up all night, right?
But I have these scary dreams...
Like the haunted house you went to with your dad over summer break?
I do not know.
But there is this monster that chases me.
And if it finds you three times, it eats you!
It ate Acchan and Yo-kun!
Those are your friends who have been absent with a cold for a long time, right?
I am next!
It found me twice!
So two of his friends had the same dream and stopped coming to school.
Dreams...
I explained that being hurt in dreams does not hurt you in the real world.
But several days later, Ryo did not wake up...
And he still has not.
The hospital says they cannot find anything wrong with him.
So that is why you have not been to work lately.
Yes.
When I told Senda-san about it...
That is for us.
That is a job for Nocturnal Community Relations.
Not a normal doctor.
I will talk to my staff.
They will be in touch soon.
Until then, I would forgotten that Nocturnal Community Relations handles this stuff...
If I would remembered sooner
Understood.
We will do what we can.
I see.
So we start with gathering information.
Yeah.
Any idea what Another it is, by the way?
No, none yet.
Log into A-Search and search for this.
You may be able to narrow it down.
Another Search System
Dreams...
Dream demons...
They give you nightmares, and swallow you up into nightmares...
There are lots of different Anothers, huh?
Evening, guys.
Wait, you are still looking for that document?
Yes.
Jeez, what do you want?
Where is Miyako-kun?
Right here.
There you are.
I have a message for you.
That party will be held again this year.
But what does that mean?
Every year, we and the other wards take turns
temporarily transferring someone to the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Office.
Transferring?
We work for one of the special wards.
Tokyo Metropolitan Government Office employees are Tokyo city employees.
We are completely different.
So every year, each ward sends one person to work with the city government for a while.
The goal is to build relationships between the wards and the city government.
And so...
This year, it is your turn.
But I have got that urgent job...
Do not worry.
Sharing that with them is part of what this is about.
Also, it starts tomorrow.
Miyako-san!
Um...
Shimizu, from Chiyoda Ward!
We saw each other at Toyama Park.
Oh, I remember!
Wait, how do you remember my name?
You are famous for a lot of reasons in our business.
You have been really busy ever since then, I have heard!
It is true.
I have heard about you as well, Miyako-san.
Hello.
I am Kanoichi Satoru, with the Tokyo Metropolitan Nocturnal Cultural and Environmental Department.
Kanoichi?
Are you related to Kanoichi Akane?
Yes, she and I are cousins.
Nice to meet you,
Miyako Arata-san.
Really?
You are willing to help us?
Yes.
That is how this works.
October 9th
If you think, from the look if it, that the Another can be eliminated,
I will deal with it.
Eliminated?
Your department has the same equipment, right?
So this is a dream demon, right?
The same one that showed up in Nerima Ward before.
Before?
It keeps happening.
A child goes into a building that nobody uses anymore,
thanks to the decreasing population, and goes into a coma.
There are tons of spots even in downtown
Tokyo that are abandoned,
due to land prices and stuff.
The spots are always places where there used to be children,
like hospitals or elementary schools.
Miyako-san?
I was just wondering why the victims are always children.
What is wrong?
I have never thought about why Anothers do anything.
Of course, we can use legends and traditions to guess at their motives.
But we lack your ears.
The Ears of Sand.
An ability that allows you to communicate with Anothers.
We do not have that.
And we do not think we need it, really.
But if you are going to co-exist, is not it better if you can communicate?
If I can exterminate an Another, I will,
and if I cannot, I will treat it as a form of natural disaster.
Do you talk with rats or typhoons?
Rats?
The Anothers have always had reasons for what they have done in all the cases I have seen.
A lot of them I could not accept or understand, but...
The Nocturnal Community Relations sections are, in theory,
supposed to find a way to co-exist with Anothers.
But we cannot communicate with them.
Well, I have been able to.
Um...
Hey...
We are not going to get anywhere like this.
Let us get going.
You are going to talk to people involved in the case, right?
October 9th
JR Shinjuku Station
Can you tell us what you know, Kakeru-kun?
Sure.
It was a rumor in Ryo's class...
I am playing tag in my dreams!
What?
I have been caught twice.
Next time, I will win!
What are you talking about?
It is just a dream, right?
But I got to win, you know?
After that, his friend stopped going to school.
And the rumors started to spread.
About how if you get caught three times, you do not wake up?
My little brother said that before he went into a coma.
It found me twice!
Just like Acchan and Yo-kun!
Are you dreaming about playing tag?
Yo-kun said he started having dreams after Acchan stopped coming to school.
He said he was having the same dreams.
He said he would dreamed about playing tag twice.
And the next day he stopped coming to school, too.
Right after that, Ryo went into a coma.
How did Ryo-kun know it was the same dream?
The game always starts in the same place, he said.
It always... starts in the same place.
The apartment block we used to play in.
The Ghost Apartments.
He made the rules.
We all dream of that place!
So it is the same!
Which means...
Which means the same thing will happen to me!
It will eat me!
What is going to happen to him?
Tell me about these Ghost Apartments.
It is an old apartment complex near our school.
Ryo used to play there with his friends.
That matches what we know about the dream demon.
It is the same case.
Please... promise me you will save my brother!
Yeah, we are on it.
Thank you!
First, tell us where these apartments are.
Okay!
Here.
This is building 28, which is no longer used,
and where they used to play.
Yeah, this feels different from the others.
Let us start by going inside.
Why do not you show us what you can do?
This was originally a Shinjuku Ward case.
Why do not you investigate the building?
We will put up a barrier.
If you are worried, I will back you up.
No, this is my job.
Good.
Thanks.
Kanoichi-san, need some tape?
No, I have my own methods.
Wow...
Oh, Miyako-san.
Call me if something comes up.
Okay, time to get to work.
Nobody's here, huh?
Did I just...
It is better than the basement under Mount Hakone.
Tag!
Tag!
Tag!
Tag!
Wait!
Huh?
It is not here.
Tag!
Tag!
Let us play!
Let us play!
Do not disappear.
This is not tag.
It is hide-and-seek.
You can hear me?
Yeah.
Are you the one who kidnapped Ryo-kun and the other kids?
I did not kidnap them.
I had them join me.
Join me?
Tag!
Wait!
Hey, we are not done talking yet!
Wait, I said!
That is not fair!
Over here!
Jeez!
Listen to me!
That is suspicious...
Are you in here?
Found you!
This is a MegaTrive!
I remember this!
I am not over there!
I am over here!
I found you!
Jeez.
You are in here!
In this world, nobody can see me.
So I cannot play with them.
But I can do what I want in their dreams.
We play three games.
If I win three times, they are mine.
Does that mean...
Since you cannot get them to play with you in reality,
you are having them play with you in dreams?
There used to be lots of people here until a while ago.
I was not lonely.
I could always play.
They are gone now, though.
Everybody left.
And I stayed here, alone.
But then, kids came that I could play with.
So I had them join me.
Now I will not be lonely!
I see...
I understand how you feel.
Lately I have not been able to play with any of my friends.
You are lonely?
A little.
So I promised I would play with them soon.
I am jealous...
Sometimes your friends have to go away for a while.
But I think you are still connected to them.
So do not force people to be your friends.
Let us look for people who will play with you.
At first, I will.
I am Arata.
Ara... ta?
If this place is lonely for you, go someplace with more people.
I will take you to a place with lots of kids.
A place where I will not be lonely?
Is there one?
Can I go there?
If you take me to a place where I will not be lonely, I will give everyone back.
But if you are lying, I will trap you in a dream.
Listen, there is no need to do that.
We can talk, like this.
So if you want to complain to me, you can.
That is what it means to be friends.
Am I wrong?
You are right!
Okay, let us get going, then!
Okay!
There you are!
Miyako-san!
We have been looking for you.
Sorry.
So, is this the Another?
Yeah.
It seems it was kidnapping children out of loneliness.
Is this your friend?
Then he is my friend, too.
Okay, let us do it, then.
Kanoichi-san?
There, it is dealt with.
Wow!
One stomp with your foot!
People who work at the Metropolitan Government Office really are amazing!
That was nothing.
It is dangerous if you are not used to it, though.
So do not try and copy me.
Were you okay, Miyako-san?
What did you just do?
I dealt with the Another.
He said he would release the children!
You are a naIve idiot.
Let us assume, hypothetically, that he released the children.
What guarantee do we have that he would not do it again?
Well...
What you are doing is the same as killing a criminal who confesses,
and saying that you have gotten rid of crime.
Anothers are things, not people.
They are stories that have stopped midway, you could say.
They repeat the same actions.
Our only option is to eliminate them.
Eliminate them?
And I cannot trust your interpreting.
You are saying the Ears of Sand are a lie?
No.
I have heard a lot of stories.
One, for instance, about a terrible Another that calls itself your friend.
Which means there is even a chance that you are trying to trick us
and bring chaos to society.
Yes... as a servant of the god of chaos and deception, Huehuecoyotl.
You know that he is the destroyer of civilization, after all.
You are saying you cannot trust me?!
Seriously?
You do not think people think that?
You have never given it a second thought?
I guess the people around you really do spoil you.
What are you getting at?!
You are not needed here.
That is what I am saying, Miyako Arata-san.
